scripts.deploy: zip -r deploy.zip * && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name voice-z-machine-interpreter --zip-file fileb://deploy.zip
scripts.delete-stack: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name voice-z-machine && aws cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name voice-z-machine
scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name voice-z-machine --template-body file://cloudformation.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM && aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name voice-z-machine
scripts.refresh-stack: yarn delete-stack && yarn stack-delete-complete && yarn create-stack && yarn stack-create-complete
scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name voice-z-machine --template-body file://cloudformation.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM && aws cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name voice-z-machine
